name: Pig Brick - the fox attack to the pig's house
name_original: Pig Brick - the fox attack to the pig's house
description:
The game where you can participate in the final chapter of the fight between Fox and the three little pigs.

Embodies the third little pig who built your House with brick and supported the attack of the Fox.

You can also respond to the attack of Fox by releases of vases, pumps, Donuts and other stuff that you have at your fingertips, take advantage of that time when this knocked out Fox to rebuild your House.

Based on a classic of the 80s, this game is more than addictive fun.
